trans-unit.source: Manages a related set of tab pages.
trans-unit.target: Gere um conjunto de páginas do separador relacionado.

trans-unit.source: A TabControl contains tab pages, which are represented by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objects that you add through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um TabControl contém páginas do separador, que são representadas por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>objetos que adicionar através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order the tabs appear in the control.
trans-unit.target: A ordem das páginas do separador nesta coleção reflete a ordem que de separadores aparecem no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The user can change the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> by clicking one of the tabs in the control.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode alterar atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>clicando dos separadores no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically change the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> by using one of the following TabControl properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can also use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], you can respond when the current tab changes by handling one of the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> The tabs in a TabControl are part of the TabControl, but not parts of the individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls.
trans-unit.target: Através de programação também pode alterar atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>utilizando uma das seguintes propriedades TabControl:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A>no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], também pode utilizar um dos seguintes métodos:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], pode responder quando o separador atual alterações feitas por processar um dos seguintes eventos:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>os separadores num TabControl são parte TabControl, mas não as partes do indivíduo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: Os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>classe, tal como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>propriedade, afetam apenas o retângulo de cliente da página de separador, mas não os separadores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> will not hide the tab.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>não será ocultar no separador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide the tab, you must remove the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para ocultar o separador, tem de remover o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>controlar a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], no separador é considerado parte da página de separador para determinar quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>ocorrer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores do .NET Framework, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>ocorre quando o foco entra ou sai de um separador, mas apenas quando o foco entra ou sai o retângulo de cliente da página de separador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: The following events are not raised for the TabControl class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os eventos seguintes não são gerados para a classe de TabControl, a menos que exista, pelo menos, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the TabControl raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Se existir, pelo menos, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>na coleção, e o utilizador interage com o cabeçalho do controlo separador (onde o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>nomes apresentados), a TabControl desencadeia o evento adequado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A> of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se a interação do utilizador estiver dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A>da página de separador, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>desencadeia o evento adequado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: Controlos incluídos num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>não são criados até que é apresentada a página de separador e quaisquer enlaces de dados nestes controlos não estão ativadas até que é apresentada a página de separador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: When visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the tab contents might not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: Quando os estilos visuais estiverem ativados e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>propriedade está definida como um valor diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, o conteúdo do separador pode não ser feita corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, you can paint the tab contents yourself using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Para contornar este problema, pode de pintura separador contents através de desenho de proprietário.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Display Side-Aligned Tabs with TabControl](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: Display Side-Aligned separadores com TabControl](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, the tab page contents might not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>propriedade está definida como um valor diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>propriedade está definida como um valor diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, o conteúdo da página de separador pode não ser feita corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area of the control (for example, along the top) where the tabs are aligned.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a área de controlo (por exemplo, ao longo da parte superior), onde os separadores são alinhados.

trans-unit.source: When the Alignment property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A> property is automatically set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de alinhamento está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A>propriedade é automaticamente definida para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, it only appears as such when the Alignment property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>propriedade, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>só é apresentada como tal, quando a propriedade de alinhamento está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property displays as if set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> value.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>propriedade mostra como se definido como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, you must also set the Alignment property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> so that the buttons display correctly.
trans-unit.target: Quando configurar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, também tem de definir a propriedade de alinhamento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>para que os botões apresentam corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to `Buttons`, you must also set the Alignment property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando configurar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>propriedade `Buttons`, também tem de definir a propriedade de alinhamento `Top` para que o conteúdo da página de separador ser apresentados corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when visual styles are enabled, and the Alignment property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the tab contents may not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, quando estilos visuais estiverem ativados, e o alinhamento for definida como um valor diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, o conteúdo do separador pode não ser composta corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual appearance of the control's tabs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a aparência visual dos separadores do controlo.

trans-unit.source: When you set the Appearance property to `FlatButtons`, it only appears as such when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to `Top`.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir a propriedade Appearance `FlatButtons`, só é apresentada como esse quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>propriedade está definida como `Top`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the Appearance property appears as if set to the `Buttons` value.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a propriedade Appearance é apresentado como se definido como o `Buttons` valor.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the Appearance property to `Buttons`, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando definir a propriedade Appearance `Buttons`, também tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>propriedade `Top` para que o conteúdo da página de separador ser apresentados corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.target: A cor de fundo do controlo.

trans-unit.source: This event is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.target: A imagem de fundo apresentada no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo, embora o pode alterar o respetivo valor e processar o evento de BackgroundImageChanged para detetar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is Tile.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é mosaico.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageLayoutChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo, embora o pode alterar o respetivo valor e processar o evento de BackgroundImageLayoutChanged para detetar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControlsInstance*>.
trans-unit.target: Este membro substitui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControlsInstance*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControlsInstance*>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>atribuído ao controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Este membro substitui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.target: Este membro substitui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> que contém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador do controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a tab is deselected.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um separador está desmarcado.

trans-unit.source: When the current tab changes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the following events occur in the following order.
trans-unit.target: Quando o separador atual alterações num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, ocorrem os eventos seguintes pela seguinte ordem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> - Deselected - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>- Desmarcada - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>estes eventos permitem-lhe efetuar tarefas como cancelar uma alteração de separador se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>se encontra num estado inválido ou atualizar o estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> recentemente apresentadas</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>

trans-unit.source: The current tab changes when the user clicks a tab, when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> method, or when you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O separador atual é alterada quando o utilizador clica num separador quando chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A>método, ou quando altera o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a tab is deselected, enabling a handler to cancel the tab change.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de um separador está desmarcado, permitindo um processador cancelar a alteração do separador.

trans-unit.source: When the current tab changes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the following events occur in the following order.
trans-unit.target: Quando o separador atual alterações num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, ocorrem os eventos seguintes pela seguinte ordem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: - Deselecting - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: -Desmarcando - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>estes eventos permitem-lhe efetuar tarefas como cancelar uma alteração de separador se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>se encontra num estado inválido ou atualizar o estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> recentemente apresentadas</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>

trans-unit.source: The current tab changes when the user clicks a tab, when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> method, or when you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamentos.

trans-unit.source: Call this method during window-message preprocessing to determine whether the specified key is a regular input key that should be sent directly to the tab control or a special key (such as PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN) that should preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método durante a janela mensagem pré-processamentos para determinar se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular que deve ser enviada diretamente para o controlo separador ou uma especial chave (por exemplo, PAGE UP e PAGE DOWN) que deve pré-processados.

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, send the key to the control only if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: No caso desta última opção, envie a chave para o controlo apenas se não é consumido pela fase de preprocessing.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To change the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> property of the ItemSize property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> property must be set to `Fixed`.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>propriedade da propriedade ItemSize, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A>propriedade tem de ser definida como `Fixed`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho dos separadores.

trans-unit.source: The default automatically sizes the tabs to fit the icons and labels on the tabs.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição tamanhos automaticamente os separadores para ajustar os ícones e etiquetas nos separadores.

trans-unit.source: The width or height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A largura ou altura do <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether more than one row of tabs can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se pode ser apresentada mais do que uma linha de separadores.

trans-unit.source: If Multiline is `false`, only one row of tabs is displayed, even if all the tabs do not fit in the available space.
trans-unit.target: Se for de múltiplas linhas `false`, apenas uma linha de separadores é apresentada, mesmo se todos os separadores não se enquadram no espaço disponível.

trans-unit.source: In that case, however, arrows are displayed that enable the user to navigate to the undisplayed tabs.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, no entanto, setas são apresentadas que permitem ao utilizador navegar para os separadores undisplayed.

trans-unit.source: If the Multiline property is changed to `false` while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to `Left` or `Right`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is automatically reset to `Top`.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade Multiline é alterada para `false` enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>propriedade está definida como `Left` ou `Right`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>propriedade automaticamente é reposta a `Top`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if more than one row of tabs can be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se pode ser apresentada mais do que uma linha de separadores; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDeselected method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDeselected também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem ligação de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> switches between the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls, depending on which keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte descreve como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>alterna entre selecionado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>controla, consoante as chaves são premidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: |Key|Description| |---------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.|
trans-unit.target: | Chave | Descrição | |---------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| Seleciona a próxima <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| Seleciona o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>anterior. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| Seleciona a próxima <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space around each item on the control's tab pages.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade de espaço em torno de cada item nas páginas de separador do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the amount of space around each item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que especifica a quantidade de espaço em torno de cada item.

trans-unit.source: The default is (6,3).
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é (6,3).

trans-unit.source: The width or height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A largura ou altura do <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: This event is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Previews uma mensagem de teclado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all the tab pages and additional controls from this tab control.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as páginas do separador e controlos adicionais deste controlo separador.

trans-unit.source: All controls are removed through the `Controls` property.
trans-unit.target: Todos os controlos são removidos através de `Controls` propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether right-to-left mirror placement is turned on.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a colocação de espelho de direita para a esquerda está ativada.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeftLayout property is primarily useful for developing forms for worldwide audiences.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RightToLeftLayout é é útil principalmente para desenvolver formulários para público em todo o mundo.

trans-unit.source: Many containers are designed so that controls are laid out in the container in a left-to-right fashion.
trans-unit.target: Muitos contentores foram concebidos para que os controlos são dispostos no contentor de uma forma de esquerda para a direita.

trans-unit.source: These containers are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction.
trans-unit.target: Estes contentores são compatíveis com idiomas que se seguem nesta direção de escrita.

trans-unit.source: However, when you display the same containers to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, quando visualiza os mesmos contentores aos utilizadores de idiomas de direita para a esquerda, muitas vezes, é preferível para inverter a ordem dos controlos no formulário.

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the container and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: Se ambas as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>propriedades são `true`, espelhamento ficará ativado para o contentor e controlo de posicionamento e fluxo de texto será direita para a esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o valor desta propriedade gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about globalization issues, see [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre problemas de globalização, consulte [melhores práticas para desenvolver aplicações do mundo preparada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if right-to-left mirror placement is turned on; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for standard child control placement.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a colocação de espelho de direita para a esquerda está ativada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para colocação de controlo subordinado padrão.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
